casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Glenn Devon McKINNEY. No. 622PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2006. William B. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of March 2006 by Defendant To Strike Issues I(A) & I(B) of the State's New Brief: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of March 2006." Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
